title: Hilaria and Alec Baldwin reveal sex of baby number 5 with help from all 4 kids
text:
CLOSE Alec Baldwin is set to become a father for the sixth time just five months after his wife Hilaria suffered a miscarriage. Cover Media

Hilaria and Alec Baldwin revealed the sex of their fifth child – with help from all four of their kids.

Hilaria took to Instagram Saturday to share the news.

"Our little reveal 💙💖. We are so excited!" she captioned the video.

In the clip, we see Hilaria direct all four children to each take a baby doll, which are wrapped in white cloth. Then, she directs her oldest, 6-year-old Carmen, to "open it up."

Alec is heard in the background getting the other kids to focus on what Carmen is doing.

"Shh, watch, what is it?" he says.

Then, Carmen unwraps the white cloth to reveal the doll is wearing a pink outfit, exclaiming, "It's a girl!"

The couple also share Rafael Thomas, 4; Leonardo, 3 and Romeo, 1. Alec has a 23-year-old daughter, Ireland, with ex-wife Kim Basinger.

In September, Hilaria shared that she was pregnant again after revealing she suffered a miscarriage this year.

"It is still very early … but we have learned that there is a little person inside of me," she wrote.

"The sound of this strong heart makes me so happy – especially because of the loss we experienced in the spring. We want to share this news as we are excited and don’t want to hide the pregnancy. These first few months are tough with exhaustion and nausea … and I don’t want to have to pretend that I feel ok," Baldwin said.

description: Hilaria and Alec Baldwin revealed the sex of their fifth child on Instagram – with help from all four of their kids.
